events.name: EV battery supply chain
events.wd_description: This event encompasses the entire supply chain of electric vehicle batteries, focusing on the materials required, technological advancements, and regional impacts.
events.description: This event encompasses the entire supply chain of electric vehicle batteries, focusing on the materials required, technological advancements, and regional impacts.

events.name: cobalt supply risks
events.wd_description: Increasing attention is given to the supply risks of critical battery materials like cobalt, particularly concerning electric mobility transitions.
events.description: Increasing attention is given to the supply risks of critical battery materials like cobalt, particularly concerning electric mobility transitions.

events.name: supply shortage
events.wd_description: The cobalt supply shortage is expected in the short- to medium-term, despite advancements in technology and recycling.
events.description: The cobalt supply shortage is expected in the short- to medium-term, despite advancements in technology and recycling.

events.name: regional supply security
events.wd_description: The level of cobalt supply security varies by region, with some regions more vulnerable to supply risks.
events.description: The level of cobalt supply security varies by region, with some regions more vulnerable to supply risks.

events.name: China
events.wd_description: China is expected to have a high cobalt supply risk due to its booming domestic EV market and reliance on overseas resources.
events.description: China is expected to have a high cobalt supply risk due to its booming domestic EV market and reliance on overseas resources.

events.name: EU and U.S.
events.wd_description: The EU and U.S. have relatively high cobalt supply security due to outsourcing battery production and controlling overseas cobalt mines.
events.description: The EU and U.S. have relatively high cobalt supply security due to outsourcing battery production and controlling overseas cobalt mines.

events.name: Japan
events.wd_description: Japan faces higher cobalt supply risks due to limited domestic reserves and overseas reserve ownership.
events.description: Japan faces higher cobalt supply risks due to limited domestic reserves and overseas reserve ownership.

events.name: cobalt recycling
events.wd_description: Cobalt recycling is seen as a critical strategy for alleviating primary supply pressures, especially in the long term.
events.description: Cobalt recycling is seen as a critical strategy for alleviating primary supply pressures, especially in the long term.

events.name: technological development
events.wd_description: Technological advancements are essential for improving recycling rates and harnessing urban mining potential.
events.description: Technological advancements are essential for improving recycling rates and harnessing urban mining potential.

events.name: regulatory and economic efforts
events.wd_description: Efforts in technology, regulations, and economic incentives are crucial for motivating cobalt recycling.
events.description: Efforts in technology, regulations, and economic incentives are crucial for motivating cobalt recycling.

events.name: societal collection system
events.wd_description: Improved collection and recycling systems are needed to reduce end-of-life losses and connect consumers with recyclers.
events.description: Improved collection and recycling systems are needed to reduce end-of-life losses and connect consumers with recyclers.

events.name: primary supply increase
events.wd_description: Increasing the primary supply of cobalt is necessary to meet demand, especially in the short- to medium-term.
events.description: Increasing the primary supply of cobalt is necessary to meet demand, especially in the short- to medium-term.

events.name: exploration and investment
events.wd_description: More exploration and investment are required to discover new cobalt deposits and enhance existing ones.
events.description: More exploration and investment are required to discover new cobalt deposits and enhance existing ones.

events.name: technology development
events.wd_description: Advanced extraction technologies, like high-pressure acid leaching, are crucial for increasing cobalt supply.
events.description: Advanced extraction technologies, like high-pressure acid leaching, are crucial for increasing cobalt supply.

events.name: efficiency improvements
events.wd_description: Enhancing the efficiency of ore extraction, smelting, and refining is necessary to boost cobalt supply.
events.description: Enhancing the efficiency of ore extraction, smelting, and refining is necessary to boost cobalt supply.

events.name: Cobalt Free Battery Technologies
events.description: Development and adoption of cobalt-free battery technologies to alleviate supply risks.

events.name: Regional Cobalt Supply Security
events.description: Varying levels of cobalt supply security across different regions (e.g., China, EU, US, Japan).

events.name: Urban Mining and Technological Development for Recycling
events.description: Advances in urban mining and recycling technologies to harness secondary cobalt supply.

events.name: Extended Producer Responsibility System
events.description: Promotion of extended producer responsibility systems to stimulate closed-loop recycling.

events.name: Societal Collection and Recycling Systems
events.description: Development of better societal collection and recycling systems to reduce end-of-life losses.

events.name: Primary Supply Increase via Exploration and Technology Development
events.description: Increasing primary supply through more exploration, investment, and technology development.
